dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, what brings you to this village?

dialogue.speaker: Village Elder
dialogue.text: We've been expecting you. We have a prophecy about someone with your skills.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: A prophecy? What does it say?

dialogue.speaker: Village Elder
dialogue.text: "A brave warrior shall come, with a heart full of justice and a sword full of fire. He shall vanquish the dark lord and bring peace to our land."
